alert.note: Alert for Grays Harbor (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 01 at 3:38PM PST until March 04 at 4:27AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Washington... Chehalis River Above Grand Mound affecting Grays Harbor and Thurston Counties. Newaukum River Near Chehalis affecting Lewis County. Chehalis River At Porter affecting Grays Harbor County. .Showers will diminish today and will not contribute to rising river levels. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chehalis River At Porter. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 48.0 feet, the Chehalis River in Grays Harbor will flood low pasture lands and some roads. High tidal levels at Aberdeen will worsen flooding along the lower reaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM PST Tuesday the stage was 47.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 48.6 feet late tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by late tonight at 1245 AM PST.
